p1: Jonathan is an Argentine chef who began cooking at 17 and went on to work in leading kitchens across Argentina, Chile, Peru, Spain, and the Netherlands. His experience includes Michelin-starred restaurants and the World’s 50 Best, such as Disfrutar in Barcelona (Best Restaurant in the World 2024), Rijks in Amsterdam, and Ambrosía in Santiago.
p2: He has also trained under Argentina’s top chef Javier Rodríguez and worked in the renowned kitchen of Peruvian chef Iván Kisic.
p3: In 2019, he was the only Argentine finalist at San Pellegrino Young Chef, and later became Head Chef in a Bib Gourmand Michelin restaurant, where he honed his own creative culinary identity.
p_home: I bring Michelin discipline, Latin passion, and Nordic clarity to the table. A mix of precision and chaos.
